name: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc.
description: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc. is a community banking institution based in Long Beach, California. Founded in 1907, the company has a rich history of serving the local communities with a commitment to providing personalized banking services. The bank operates through its subsidiary, Farmers & Merchants Bank, which offers a range of financial products including personal and business checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. Farmers & Merchants Bank prides itself on its customer-centric approach, focusing on building long-term relationships with its clients while fostering community engagement. As a traditional community bank, FLIC emphasizes local decision-making and financial support for businesses and individuals in the region. The company has a strong capital position and is known for its conservative lending practices, which contribute to its stability and resilience in the ever-changing financial landscape. Farmers & Merchants Bancorp continues to adapt to technological advancements, providing online banking services and mobile applications to enhance customer convenience. With a focus on community development, the bank actively participates in various local initiatives, supporting education, housing, and economic growth. The mission of Farmers & Merchants Bancorp is to remain a trusted financial partner, dedicated to serving the needs of its customers and the communities in which it operates.

seo.meta_title: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc., a community bank dedicated to providing personalized banking services and supporting local communities in California.

faq.question: What services does Farmers & Merchants Bank offer?
faq.answer: Farmers & Merchants Bank offers personal and business banking services, including checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Farmers & Merchants Bancorp?
faq.answer: Henry Walker is the CEO of Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Farmers & Merchants Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp is headquartered in Long Beach, California, USA.

faq.question: When was Farmers & Merchants Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp was founded in 1907.
